testcase.name: Check login is successful with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given user is on login page.................................................passed When user enters username and password......................................passed And clicks on login button..................................................passed Then user is navigated to the home page.....................................passed

testcase.name: Check login with invalid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given user is on login page.................................................passed When user enters invalid username and password..............................passed And clicks on login button..................................................passed Then error message is displayed - Invalid Credentials.......................passed
